EmailTemplate.description: When an employee gets a ‘Peer’ recognition
EmailTemplate.name: Peer Recognition Email template for Resource
EmailTemplate.subject: RnR: Peer Recognition for Exceptional Contribution
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Resource__c},
We hope this message finds you well. We wanted to take a moment to highlight and appreciate the exceptional contribution you made as part of {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Project__c}. Your dedication and collaborative spirit were truly outstanding.
Your peer, {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Recognization_By__c}, has recognized your efforts, and it is with great pleasure that we acknowledge your valuable contribution to our team's success. Well done!
Congratulations on this peer recognition!
Best Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
